name: liberty-for-slaves
description: We are an abolitionist organization dedicated to eradicating slave ownership and fighting for human rights, fairness and justice. Our mission is to create a slavery-free world where everyone has freedom from oppression or coercion.
author: Cattynip<cattynip.cattynip@gmail.com>

scripts.format: next lint && yarn eslint . --fix && yarn prettier --write .
